name: Royalton Partners
membership: Invest Europe, Luxembourg Private Equity Association (LPEA), Association of the Luxembourg Fund Industry (ALFI), Polskie Stowarzyszenie Inwestorów Kapitałowych (PSIK)
goal: Royalton is an authorised Alternative Investment Fund Manager. We are providing regulatory services to EU-based and non-EU asset managers. Our goal is to ensure compliance of our company and our clients with the EU law  in the most efficient manner.
euInitiatives: Alternative Investment Fund Management Directive, Markets in Financial Instruments Directive, AIFMD, MIFID, ESMA
